message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I believe it's a game-changer and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000. This is a great deal, considering the product is worth $1,200,000 to you. I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else. What do you say? Are you ready to make a deal?
